version_description:
Timetable updated.
Added track layout and interlocking view for some major stations.

Timetable updated.
Added track layout and interlocking view for some major stations.

Some issues fixed.

Timetable updated.
Added track layout and interlocking view for some major stations.

Some issues fixed.

Fixed an issue that does not work with iPhone 8 and iPhone X.
Some issues fixed.
Fixed an issue work with iOS 12.

Solved the problem that a scenario that can not be selected is displayed.
For some stop signals, the problem was solved that the brake operation in automatic operation performed an unexpected operation.

Fixed an issue work with iOS 12.
Fixed the problem that the aspect ratio is abnormal on iPhone 8.
Fixed the problem that the aspect ratio is abnormal on iPhone 8.
